metadata.title: CVE-2024-38620 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:Bluetooth: HCI: Remove HCI_AMP support Since BT_HS has been remove HCI_AMPcontrollers no longer has any use so remove it along with the capability ofcreating AMP controllers. Since we no longer need to differentiate betweenAMP and Primary controllers, as only HCI_PRIMARY is left, this also removehdev->dev_type altogether.
